name: LV: Light and Void
description:
LV: Light and Void

A project which should have never seen the light. An old VHS Camera records, for unknown reasons, a flying object light-years away from Earth. The transmission is full of interferences that hide secrets and images. Dive yourself in the cosmic mysteries of LV, an incredibly fast runner game, where every detail, every second and every light-year counts.

Game features:

• Discover the secrets of LV as you progress in the game
• Change between L/V while travelling to the speed of light
• Speed and difficulty increase constantly. You will need cosmic reflexes to go beyond
• 7 languages available: English, Spanish, German, French, Italian, Portuguese and Russian

Please keep the spoilers to a minimum
**Also available on iOS and Android with global ranking and achievements.
